content: प्रग्रह् {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To take, hold, seize, grasp. {@--2@} To receive, accept. {@--3@} To curb, restrain. {@--4@} To stretch forth, extend. {@--5@} To favour, behave friendly with. {@--6@} To keep separate (as the प्रगृह्य vowels). {@--7@} To offer. {@--8@} To unite with. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To receive, accept.
